alert.note: Alert for Covington (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Butler, eastern Conecuh and northwestern Covington Counties through 445 AM CDT... At 359 AM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm 8 miles north of Evergreen, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Evergreen, McKenzie, River Falls, Red Level and Heath. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
